original_text: But now I have not taken all the firstborn sons among the Israelites. I have taken the Levites instead.
korean_text: 이러므로 내가 이스라엘 자손 중 모든 처음 태어난 자 대신 레위인을 취하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But now I have not taken
all the firstborn sons among the Israelites
I have taken the Levites instead
